title: Wireless RF Compliance Validation Engineer
summary: At Apple, we work every single day to craft products that enrich people’s lives. Do you love working on challenges that no one has solved yet? Do you like changing the game? As a member of our dynamic group, you will have the unique and rewarding opportunity to shape upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of Apple’s customers every day! Apple Compliance Engineering team is looking for engineers to do wireless regulatory characterization and demonstrate regulatory compliance for different Apple products.
description:
-  Validating emission test cases for different regulatory domains in certification test setups.
-  Translating WW emission requirements into test cases. Coordinating with regulatory compliance teams to ensure product validation covers all certification tests.
-  Define and implement validation plan for regulatory facing SW features
-  Experience debugging marginal/failure tests and engaging with multi-functional teams like RFHW/Antenna/ Product Design/EE/etc. and drive design changes to address issues
-  Maintain test setups via periodic checks, calibration, etc.
-  Help Regulatory Compliance teams in planning and delivering final certification testing at 3rd party test labs.
key_qualifications:
You have experience and in-depth understanding of System Transceiver RF Parametric and RF component level characteristics and behaviors.
You have working experience with lab equipment including network analyzers, signal generators, signal analyzers and call boxes (i.e., CMW/8960/UXM).
Detailed understanding of at least one Wireless technology including 5G FR1, FR2, GSM, UMTS, CDMA, LTE, 802.11a/b/g/n/ac/ax and Bluetooth is a plus.
Understanding of Antenna characteristics impact to radiated testing is preferred. Familiarity with radiated test setups, radiated chamber calibration and use are also a plus.
Proficiency in MATLAB simulations, or STK, CST, HFSS simulation is a bonus.
Knowledge on worldwide Regulatory standards in relation to carry a product to certification is a plus.
education_experience: Bachelor's Degree with 3 or more years of relevant work experience.
